songs.title: In My Room
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Where you wanna be?
In my room (Yeah)
Alone you and me
In my room (Yeah)
Tell me what you wanna see
In my room (Yeah)
'Cause I could be everything you need
In my room
Yeah, what you wanna see?
Yeah, and where you wanna be?
I know what you wanna do
That's why you're calling me
That's why you're calling me

[Chorus]
I know where you wanna be
In my room (Yeah)
Alone you and me
In my room (Yeah)
Tell me what you wanna see tonight
In my room (Yeah)
'Cause I can be everything you need
In my room, yeah

[Verse 2]
Where you wanna be?
In my room
Alone you and me
In my room
Tell me what you wanna see tonight
In my room (Yeah)
'Cause I can be everything you need
In my room (Yeah)
I know where you wanna be
In my room (Yeah)
Alone you and me
In my room (Yeah)
Tell me what you wanna see tonight
In my room
'Cause I can be everything you need
In my room, ah
Where you wanna be?
